title: Brian Makse (racer, instructor, journalist)
description:
One of our favorite Canadians! Brian Makse is a driving instructor, racer, and YouTuber. 

 

Follow his work: 

https://www.youtube.com/user/brianmakse

https://www.hagerty.com/media/opinion/the-elsinore-files/who-is-brian-makse-and-why-is-he-here/

http://www.makse.com/

 

https://www.butcherbox.com/tire

https://www.offtherecord.com/tst 

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman

 

Watch the show! https://youtu.be/XzikhJvD8FI
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
